2000.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Enterprise backup and recovery software. Competing with legacy vendors.

competitors.name: Veritas
competitors.notes: Major backup software vendor with NetBackup

competitors.name: EMC/Legato
competitors.notes: NetWorker backup software dominant in enterprise market

competitors.name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup and storage management solution

competitors.name: Computer Associates ARCserve
competitors.notes: Popular backup software for Windows and enterprise

2005.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Unified data management platform. Archive and compliance features.

competitors.name: Veritas NetBackup (Symantec)
competitors.notes: Market leader in enterprise backup software following the Symantec-Veritas merger in July 2005. NetBackup was Veritas's flagship product and maintained dominance in the enterprise backup market.

competitors.name: EMC
competitors.notes: Major player in the backup and storage market, competing with backup software and storage solutions for enterprise data centers.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup and storage vendor with Tivoli Storage Manager, competing in the enterprise data protection market.

competitors.name: HP
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup solutions provider competing in the data center backup market.

competitors.name: Backup Exec
competitors.notes: Backup software targeting the SMB market, part of Veritas/Symantec portfolio, competing in the mid-market backup segment.

2010.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Virtual machine protection. Cloud backup emerging.

competitors.name: Symantec NetBackup
competitors.notes: Leading enterprise backup solution after 2005 Veritas acquisition

competitors.name: EMC Avamar
competitors.notes: Deduplication-based backup solution acquired by EMC in 2006

competitors.name: EMC NetWorker
competitors.notes: Traditional backup software from EMC (formerly Legato)

competitors.name: IBM Tivoli Storage Manager
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup, later renamed Spectrum Protect

competitors.name: CA ARCserve
competitors.notes: Backup and recovery software for enterprise and SMB

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Founded 2006, rapidly growing in VMware backup market

competitors.name: Dell Data Protection Suite
competitors.notes: Dell's backup solutions including AppAssure

2015.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Cloud data management. Azure and AWS integration.

competitors.name: Veritas Technologies
competitors.notes: Market leader in backup and recovery software with NetBackup as the flagship enterprise product. Maintained top position in the market in 2015.

competitors.name: EMC
competitors.notes: Second largest vendor in the data center backup market, offering comprehensive backup and storage solutions including Data Domain appliances.

competitors.name: IBM
competitors.notes: Third largest vendor with Tivoli Storage Manager and enterprise backup solutions competing in the data center market.

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Fifth largest vendor in 2015, rapidly growing with agentless VM backup software for VMware and Hyper-V. Known for virtualization backup expertise and gaining significant market share.

competitors.name: Acronis
competitors.notes: Backup and disaster recovery vendor competing with comprehensive backup capabilities and integrated cybersecurity tools.

competitors.name: HP/HPE
competitors.notes: Enterprise backup vendor with data protection solutions competing in the data center backup market.

competitors.name: Arcserve
competitors.notes: Backup and disaster recovery software vendor serving the enterprise and mid-market segments.

2020.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. SaaS data protection. Metallic cloud offering launched.

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Market leader with 20.28% share, cloud-first approach

competitors.name: Veritas NetBackup
competitors.notes: Enterprise-scale data protection solution

competitors.name: Cohesity
competitors.notes: Founded 2013, modern hyperconverged secondary storage

competitors.name: Rubrik
competitors.notes: Founded 2014, cloud data management platform

competitors.name: Druva
competitors.notes: Cloud-native SaaS backup using AWS infrastructure

competitors.name: Acronis Cyber Protect
competitors.notes: Backup with integrated cybersecurity and ransomware protection

competitors.name: Dell PowerProtect
competitors.notes: Next-generation backup appliances formerly EMC Data Domain

competitors.name: Zerto
competitors.notes: Continuous data protection with near-zero RPO

competitors.name: NAKIVO
competitors.notes: Affordable VM backup for SMBs

competitors.name: HYCU
competitors.notes: SaaS-based data protection for hybrid environments

2024.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Merged with Metallic. Cyber resilience focus with AI.

competitors.name: Acronis Cyber Protect
competitors.notes: AI-powered cybersecurity with backup integration

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Major player with reliable, scalable solutions

competitors.name: Rubrik
competitors.notes: Focus on cyber resilience, data security, identity security

competitors.name: Cohesity/Veritas
competitors.notes: Cohesity acquired Veritas in December 2024

competitors.name: HYCU
competitors.notes: Top-rated SaaS solution for hybrid cloud backup

competitors.name: Druva
competitors.notes: Cloud-native SaaS with faster deployment

competitors.name: NAKIVO
competitors.notes: User-friendly virtualization backup for SMBs

competitors.name: Bacula Systems
competitors.notes: Comprehensive data management supporting VMs and cloud

competitors.name: Zerto
competitors.notes: Cloud-based disaster recovery and ransomware resilience

competitors.name: Datto
competitors.notes: MSP-oriented backup and disaster recovery

2025.context: Commvault Systems, Inc. is a data protection and management software company focused on backup, recovery, and data management across cloud and on-premises. Hybrid cloud data protection. Competing with Veeam, Cohesity, Rubrik.

competitors.name: Veeam
competitors.notes: Leading backup and recovery solution particularly strong in VMware environments

competitors.name: Veritas Technologies

competitors.name: Cohesity

competitors.name: Rubrik

competitors.name: Druva
